boat.name: Windflower
boat.full_description: Windflower has been sailed successfully in local club regattas with several class wins in the annual Yarmouth Taittinger Regatta including winning the regatta overall in 2013. Windflower has also won Yogaf on two occasions and won a number of races at the RLYC including the coveted Potters Ship Trophy.
boat.construction_details: Carvel pitch pine on American rock elm w/ Teak superstructure
boat.short_description: Similar to the designer's XOD but larger

for_sales.sales_text:
Windflower has been sailed successfully in local club regattas with several class wins in the annual Yarmouth Taittinger Regatta including winning the regatta overall in 2013. Windflower has also won Yogaf on two occasions and won a number of races at the RLYC including the coveted Potters Ship Trophy.

She had a major refit in 2005 which included a new engine, spars, rigging and sails. The current owner purchased her in 2008 and has maintained her regularly to keep her in excellent overall condition. Windflower has been kept ashore undercover in the winter months and comes with her own cradle and full winter cover. Her sail inventory has been continually upgraded along with her running and standing rigging.

More details at the Sandeman Yacht Company.
